participant_abstract.sent: In this meeting we discarded the idea of building an expensive remote control and instead went for a stylish remote control with limited functionality.
We finally decided against the idea of using an LCD as part of the remote control.
The marketing manager informed us of the current trend towards using fruit in design and this became the basis of our design.

participant_actions.sent: The user interface designer and the design engineer will create a clay model of the remote control.
For the roles of other members, please see the minutes.

nite:root.participant_decisions:
Shape of the remote control is to be a banana. The control is to have two scroll wheels, a turbo button, and a teletext button. One scroll wheel is for volume The other scroll wheel is for channel selection The turbo button allows the user to quickly skip past channels without displaying them
The remote control will come with a base station which can cause the remote control to emit a noise for determining its location.. The base station also functions as a recharger.*

participant_problems.sent: There was not enough time to discuss the pros and cons of using fruit as a design element.
